name: Drop the Seed
description:
Made in 48h for the 2023 Global Gamejam

Drop The Seed is a game in which you can control several seeds. You have to grow a tree by planting the seeds in the right place while dodging random obstacles.

Credits :

Game Designer : Lucien Hernandez

Dev UE4 : Celthim
